column5: I'm  going to memesagamesing lake on the weekend and was wondering if anybody knew of any crown land camp sites there?

It really surprises me that no one has anything to say about this. The sag is one of my favorite places on earth but I've only been there 6 or 7 times. So my knowledge of this lake isn't exactly great, but I'll give you as much info as I can. We've always camped on one of the many crown land islands. The fishing can be hit or miss. I've never been up there in August, so I can't tell you what to expect for this time of year. But I do know that it is a very picturesque and peaceful place and if your looking to relax, then this is the spot. I hope others can chime in because I'd love to hear more. I hope I'm able to get up there next year. Good luck and enjoy !
